item.title: Class20_Sub1
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

Okay so my Class20 gave me the error to big, so I found a tutorial to extend it into a Class20_Sub1.
Class20_Sub1:

[code]
public final class Class20_Sub1 extends Class20 {

public static void unpackConfig_Sub1(int j) {
       //Anims
     }

}[/code]
And to add this

Under

In class20.

Well After I did all that I added some new configs into the class20_Sub1 and got no errors when I compiled, however when I ran the client I got the
Error: loaderror Unpacking config 86
I think the client doesn’t read the anim files from the anim folder that’s my guess but I’m not sure so I decided to come here for help, any help is much appreciated, thanks !

Read full topic
